channel.title: Python Pelican R Blogdown on Dr. Juan Camilo Orduz
channel.description: Recent content in Python Pelican R Blogdown on Dr. Juan Camilo Orduz

item.title: From Pelican to Blogdown
item.description: Here I want to discuss my transition from pelican to blogdown and present some personal learnings. In June 2017 I decided to build a personal website/portafolio. I chose pelican, because: It is written in Python, which was the programing language I was mainly working on. I wanted to include some jupyter notebook I had already written. A great post: Building a data science portfolio: Making a data science blog explaining the procedure and using GitHub Pages to publist it.
